title: How to Play the Kissing Game

steps.title: Ask everyone to sit in a circle.
steps.content: Ask everyone to sit in a circle. No chairs are required, just have everyone sit on the ground. Try to arrange everyone in a boy-girl-boy-girl pattern.

steps.title: Place the bottle in the middle of the circle.
steps.content: Place the bottle in the middle of the circle. Lay the bottle on its side. If the circle is large, players might need to get up and go to the middle of the circle to spin the bottle. If it isn’t too big then you should be able to just lean forward and spin it.

steps.title: Spin the bottle.
steps.content: Spin the bottle. Grabbing the bottle around the middle with your thumb and index finger, rotate your wrist sharply and then release to give the bottle a spin.

steps.title: Kiss the person that the bottle points to when it stops spinning.
steps.content: Kiss the person that the bottle points to when it stops spinning. Whoever is closest to where the bottle is pointing when it stops spinning is the person that the bottle spinner has to kiss.

steps.title: Spin again.
steps.content: Spin again. Whoever is seated to the right of the last bottle spinner goes next. Keep playing until everyone in the circle has had a chance to spin the bottle.

steps.title: Get a playing card or index card.
steps.content: Get a playing card or index card. You can also use a piece of construction paper or cardstock as long as you trim it down to the size of a playing card. Just remember that the card needs to be large enough to completely cover your mouth. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Ask everyone to stand in a circle.
steps.content: Ask everyone to stand in a circle. Arrange everyone in a boy-girl-boy-girl pattern. The circle should be fairly tight, since a card will be passed from mouth to mouth in this game.

steps.title: Start the game.
steps.content: Start the game. The person with the card must suck gently on the card to keep it on his or her lips. While sucking, the card holder must attempt to pass it to the next person using only his or her mouth. No hands are allowed in this game! [2] X Research source

steps.title: Pass the card or kiss.
steps.content: Pass the card or kiss. Press the card against the lips of the person next to you and keep sucking. Keep the paper in place until the next person makes contact with it. Then blow gently on the paper to release it to the next person. If the paper falls, those two have to kiss. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Rotate the girls.
steps.content: Rotate the girls. Every time the card drops, the girls must rotate one space to the left so that they are standing next to one new boy. This rotation will keep the game exciting by constantly changing the person next to the players. Keep playing until the card has made a full rotation around the circle or until everyone has kissed someone. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Write all of your guests’ names on small pieces of paper.
steps.content: Write all of your guests’ names on small pieces of paper. Fold them up so that the names are hidden, but keep the boys’ names separate from the girls names. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Put the pieces of paper into two hats.
steps.content: Put the pieces of paper into two hats. Put all of the girls’ names into one hat and all of the boys’ names into another hat. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Draw a name from each hat.
steps.content: Draw a name from each hat. Mix up the names before you draw a name from each hat. As you pull out each name, read it aloud to your guests. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Send those two people into the closet together.
steps.content: Send those two people into the closet together. If you don’t have a large enough closet, you can send them into a small dark room, like a bathroom or laundry room. Just make sure that the lighting is dim and they are in somewhat close quarters. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Set a timer for seven minutes.
steps.content: Set a timer for seven minutes. Use a stopwatch or just watch the clock for seven minutes. Let them out when the timer is up. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Draw new names.
steps.content: Draw new names. Keep the game going by drawing new names. Place the names that you have already drawn to the side so that all of your guests have a turn.

steps.title: Gather everyone into a room.
steps.content: Gather everyone into a room. Make sure the room has a door that the “postman” can knock on and enter through.

steps.title: Send one person out of the room.
steps.content: Send one person out of the room. You can choose the person who has to leave the room and knock on the door to reenter at random or ask for volunteers.

steps.title: Choose someone to answer the door when they knock.
steps.content: Choose someone to answer the door when they knock. Again, you can choose the person at random or ask for volunteers. Someone may want to volunteer if they like the person who has left the room and want to kiss him or her.

steps.title: Tell the postman and door opener to kiss.
steps.content: Tell the postman and door opener to kiss. When the door is opened, the two people standing on either side of it have to kiss.

steps.title: Repeat with new people.
steps.content: Repeat with new people. Start a new round by selecting a new postman and door opener. Keep playing until everyone has had a chance.

steps.title: Separate a deck of playing cards into black and red decks.
steps.content: Separate a deck of playing cards into black and red decks. After you have separated the cards into two decks, shuffle each deck separately.

steps.title: Distribute the playing cards.
steps.content: Distribute the playing cards. Give a card from the black deck to each of the boys and give a card form the red deck to each of the girls. Don’t look at cards as you hand them out. Hand them out at random. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Ask everyone to reveal their cards.
steps.content: Ask everyone to reveal their cards. Have everyone hold their cards in front of them so that everyone can see the card’s number or face. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Pair up the matches.
steps.content: Pair up the matches. Ask everyone to look for the person whose card number or face matches theirs. Matching numbers hand faces have to kiss. For example, if a boy has a black seven of spades and a girl has a red seven of hearts, those two have to kiss. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Collect the cards and play again.
steps.content: Collect the cards and play again. After all of the players with matching cards have kissed, collect their cards (keeping black and red cards separate) then shuffle the cards and play again. Keep playing until everyone has gotten a couple of kisses from different people.
